title: Dead easy
creator_credit: Firebird Films, John Weiley and Bert Deling
brief_description: Set in Sydney and supposedly based on actual events, a policeman, prostitute and a hustler become involved in gang war and find that life can be very dangerous. After they cross a small-time bookie they are hunted by every hoodlum in town.
creator_credit_for_label: Firebird Films, John Weiley and Bert Deling
